examplePhrases: Alexa ask Athena for a fact
Alexa tell Athena to tell me trivia
en-US.name: Athena
en-US.description:
Ask for Facts, and learn about what really matters.

To start, just say "Alexa, launch Athena" or "Alexa, open Athena" to get a fact".

At anytime, you can stop by saying "Alexa, stop"
